subject: Doping (Sports)
Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Decisions and Verdicts
organizations: New York State Racing and Wagering Board
lead_paragraph: Some prominent horse owners announced that they would immediately stop using race-day medications on their 2-year-old horses and called for their fellow owners to do the same.
snippet: Some prominent horse owners announced that they would immediately stop using race-day medications on their 2-year-old horses and called for their fellow owners to do the same.
